irisbook.title: IRISbook
irisbook.about: IRISbook is a boutique album company that works exclusively with professional photographers. We create stunning, handcrafted, fine art albums with the utmost attention to detail and quality. Comprised of photographers and artisans, we have a first-hand understanding of your needs and your desire for excellence.

jvpfi.title: Jesuit Volunteer Philippines Foundation, Inc.
jvpfi.about: JVP is a community dedicated to the task of nation-building by promoting volunteerism and serving as development network in increasing literacy, creating more equitable access to health services, education and community life, especially for the marginalized and underprivileged. We are also a network of leaders in our own communities or fields of concerns.
jvpfi.responsibilities: We created a responsive static website using Bootstrap and CSS Animations.
